  • Description: The shipment was discovered leaking during sort operations. Outer packaging: UN4GV/X40.1/S/25 USA/M586. Inner contents: 3 glass bottles @ 4 Liters each, wrapped in bubble wrap and vermiculite. One bottle was broken. All contents were placed in a salvage drum and held for shipper disposition.
